item.title: 据当局称，一名重罪犯于周日向押送他的副警长喷辣椒水并偷走她的汽车后逃跑，周二在新奥尔良被抓获。
item.description:
A convicted felon who escaped on Sunday after pepper spraying his transporting deputy and stealing her car was captured in New Orleans Tuesday, authorities said.https://t.co/vTUcpvNKVC

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据纳什维尔警察局发言人称，曾在 2023 年发生过大规模枪击事件的圣约学校周一收到了炸弹威胁。
item.description:
The Covenant School, which was the site of a 2023 mass shooting, received a bomb threat on Monday, according to a Nashville Police Department spokesperson. https://t.co/5I0rWJZGgw

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 本周二，卫生官员确认了第七例麻疹病例，该病例与佛罗里达一所小学爆发的麻疹疫情有关。
item.description:
The seventh case of measles linked to an outbreak at a Florida elementary school was confirmed by Health officials on Tuesday. https://t.co/cf45GTmO2C

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名加拿大游客在夏威夷的一条偏僻公路上拐错了弯，将租来的汽车开下了 60 英尺高的悬崖，然后摔出车外，被海水冲走，幸好他还活着。
item.description:
A Canadian tourist is lucky to be alive after he apparently took a wrong turn on a remote road in Hawaii and drove his rental car off a 60-foot cliff, before falling out of the vehicle and getting washed out to sea, authorities said. https://t.co/J0Rmfrf7im

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在克里姆林宫持续镇压异议人士之际，俄罗斯最著名的人权捍卫者之一因批评乌克兰战争被莫斯科法院判处两年半监禁。
item.description:
One of Russia's best-known human rights defenders was sentenced by a Moscow court to two and a half years in prison for criticizing the war in Ukraine, amid a continuing crackdown by the Kremlin on dissent. https://t.co/xwzd38Ldlt

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 随着新一轮冬季风暴向西海岸袭来，加州内华达山脉将迎来多达 12 英尺的积雪：
item.description:
Up to 12 feet of snow is heading to California's Sierra Nevada mountains as a new winter storm bears down on the West Coast.

See the latest forecast: https://t.co/2hMt4bRWbU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）市长似乎支持修改使纽约成为庇护城市的法律。"如果你犯下重罪或暴力行为，我们应该能够将你移交给移民及海关执法局，并将你驱逐出境，"亚当斯周一说道。
item.description:
JUST IN: Mayor Eric Adams appeared to support a modification of laws that make New York a sanctuary city.

"If you commit a felony, a violent act, we should be able to turn you over to ICE and have you deported," Adams said Monday.https://t.co/GSNvT5UtPh pic.twitter.com/QNDAauvjhq

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在发生了一系列广为人知的据称由移民犯下的罪行后，埃里克-亚当斯市长似乎支持修改法律，将纽约设为庇护城市。
item.description:
JUST IN: After a series of well-publicized crimes allegedly committed by migrants, Mayor Eric Adams appeared to support a modification of laws that make New York a sanctuary city. https://t.co/LlsJND6P0a

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 丰田公司正在美国召回约 38.1 万辆 Tacoma 中型皮卡车，因为一个部件可能会从后车桥分离，从而增加撞车风险。
item.description:
Toyota is recalling about 381,000 Tacoma midsize pickup trucks in the U.S. because a part can separate from the rear axle, increasing the risk of a crash. https://t.co/eSzGUoBhcL

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 再见了，小鸟：缅因州的新车牌设计中，雏鸟正在让位给其他图案。新车牌的图案是一棵高大的绿色松树（州树）和北极星，这两个图案出现在 1901 年该州的第一面官方旗帜上。
item.description:
Bye-bye, birdie: Maine's chickadee is making way for other images on a new license plate design for the state.

The new plate features a tall green pine — the state tree — and the North Star, two icons featured on the state's first official flag in 1901. https://t.co/bqDoUmtr81 pic.twitter.com/1vIpKOtNZx

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：两名来自皇后区的男子在 2002 年 10 月 30 日谋杀著名嘻哈组合 Run-DMC 成员 Jam Master Jay 的案件中被判有罪。
item.description:
BREAKING: Two men from Queens have been found guilty on all counts in the Oct. 30, 2002, murder of Jam Master Jay, a member of the iconic hip-hop group Run-DMC. https://t.co/VyAW4plyb9 pic.twitter.com/BtUrIwd0T7

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 根据最新提交的逮捕宣誓书，在佐治亚大学校园内杀害一名护理专业学生的嫌疑人在作案时使用了一个物体作为武器，并被指控 "毁坏了她的头骨"。
item.description:
The suspect in the killing of a nursing student on the University of Georgia campus used an object as a weapon in the crime and is accused of “disfiguring her skull,” according to newly filed arrest affidavits. https://t.co/wa9nefOrGI pic.twitter.com/CU0jdr4Xry

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的一位盟友声称，这位反对派领袖死在俄罗斯的一个监狱时，将通过交换囚犯而获得自由，此后，一位西方官员说，事实上，在讨论可能的交换时，他的名字曾被提及。
item.description:
After an ally of Alexei Navalny made a claim that the opposition leader was set to be freed through a prisoner exchange when he died in a Russian penal colony, a Western official said his name had, in fact, been raised in discussions about a possible swap. https://t.co/z9RAJSmgSe pic.twitter.com/sDVxvrjP3O

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 当局说，宾夕法尼亚州警方正在寻找一名 23 岁阿米什族孕妇遇害后的线索。当局说，他们正在 "积极调查 "丽贝卡-贝勒（Rebekah Byler）的死因。
item.description:
Police in Pennsylvania are searching for leads after a 23-year-old pregnant Amish woman was killed, authorities said.

Authorities said they are "aggressively investigating" Rebekah Byler's death. https://t.co/7LXoNvOImh pic.twitter.com/spSqMyjS7E

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 通胀率已从2022年的高点大幅回落，但在2024年大选之前，密歇根州这一关键战场上的拜登选民却在发表他们对经济的悲观看法。
item.description:
Inflation has fallen dramatically from its high in 2022, but these Biden voters in the key battleground of Michigan are speaking on their dour views of the economy ahead of the 2024 election. https://t.co/NXXf7Lv4uU

item.title: 一些黑人保守派人士仍然支持前总统特朗普，尽管他最近的言论表明他加强了对美国黑人的吸引力，声称他们与他的多项刑事起诉有关。
item.description:
Some Black conservatives are still supporting former Pres. Trump, despite his recent comments suggesting he has strengthened his appeal to Black Americans by claiming they relate to his multiple criminal indictments. https://t.co/2GsPil3guV

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，去年日本婴儿出生人数连续第八年下降，这是日本自 1899 年开始统计以来出生人数最低的一年。
item.description:
The number of babies born in Japan last year fell for an eighth straight year, government data showed Tuesday — the lowest number of births since the country began compiling the statistics in 1899. https://t.co/Wc9EQjNs4p

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 唐-亨利（Don Henley）周二继续在老鹰乐队（Eagles）包括《加州旅馆》（Hotel California）在内的几首名曲歌词手写草稿的庭审中作证，他长达十年之久的努力就是为了夺回这几页歌词。
item.description:
Don Henley resumed testifying Tuesday in a trial over handwritten drafts of lyrics to some of the Eagles' biggest hits, including "Hotel California," and his decade-long effort to reclaim the pages. https://t.co/KE9RXB9x2i

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 梦想去火星？美国国家航空航天局（NASA）正在地球上为志愿者提供另一个世界的体验，参与者在那里吃、住、交流，就像在 2 亿多英里以外的太空中一样。
item.description:
Dream of going to Mars?

NASA is offering volunteers an otherworldly experience here on Earth, where participants eat, live and communicate as if they were over 200 million miles away in space. https://t.co/VkQkNeh5Uf pic.twitter.com/W74pcyzYCM

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 如果您观看了 Lifetime 周末首播的温迪-威廉姆斯（Wendy Williams）专题片并感到不安，那么您并不孤单。纪录片制作人说，他们在拍摄时并不知道威廉姆斯患有痴呆症，而公众上周才知道。
item.description:
If you watched Lifetime's Wendy Williams docuseries that premiered over the weekend and felt uneasy, you weren't alone.

Documentary producers say they weren't aware at the time of filming that Williams had dementia, which the public learned last week. https://t.co/J19kn8I1GC

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国陆军正在削减约 24000 人的兵力，减幅接近 5%。
item.description:

item.title: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周二表示，该公司将在未来三年内关闭 150 家效益不佳的门店，其中包括在 2024 年底前关闭 50 家门店。梅西百货是在公布第四季度亏损和销售额下降后关闭门店的。
item.description:
Macy's will close 150 unproductive stores over the next three years, including 50 by the end of 2024, the department store operator said Tuesday.

The closures come after the company posted a fourth-quarter loss and declining sales. https://t.co/qWpve4nXGD pic.twitter.com/oWlKwaAWpd

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 拜登政府周二宣布，联邦政府将资助全美 17 个项目，以扩大美国原住民保留地和其他农村地区的可再生能源使用范围。
item.description:
The federal government will fund 17 projects across the U.S. to expand access to renewable energy on Native American reservations and in other rural areas, the Biden administration announced Tuesday. https://t.co/Bq98npJYiE

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024
